name: electrically

using or involving electricity: an electrically powered car When aluminium foil touches another metal in the mouth, the metals become electrically charged. See
electrical
More examplesFewer examplesThe roof is electrically operated and you can open and close it at the press of a button.The system can be connected to virtually any type of electrically controlled device.Being powered electrically, the trams are described as pollution free.
